critical_issues.title: BQX backfill process hung at 34.3%
critical_issues.impact: Blocks Phase 1 completion, prevents feature engineering progress
affected_components: Phase 2 feature engineering (depends on complete data)

root_cause.summary: Import path broken after file migration to bqx-ml repository
root_cause.details: Script running from /home/ubuntu/Robkei-Ring/sandbox/scripts imports from hardcoded path that no longer exists after migration. Python import fails, threads hang waiting for module.
root_cause.technical: Line 15 of backward_worker_threaded.py: sys.path.insert(0, '/home/ubuntu/Robkei-Ring/sandbox/scripts') - this path no longer has backward_worker.py

symptoms: Process PID 216204 active but not progressing (6h+ runtime)
Log file shows last entry at 32.1% progress (EURAUD completion)
No errors in log file (silent hang)

resolution.fix: Edit line 15 of /home/ubuntu/bqx-ml/scripts/backfill/backward_worker_threaded.py to point to '/home/ubuntu/bqx-ml/scripts/backfill'
resolution.verification: Monitor log for progress, verify rows increasing in database

critical_issues.prevention: Use relative imports or environment variables instead of hardcoded paths

high_priority_issues.title: Phase 0 infrastructure not started (prerequisite for other phases)
high_priority_issues.impact: SageMaker, VPC, and secrets infrastructure needed before Phase 4-10 can proceed

root_cause.summary: Infrastructure setup was missing actionable tasks
root_cause.details: Gap analysis revealed Phase 0 stages had no tasks defined. Remediation added 9 tasks but they remain unexecuted.

resolution.immediate: Begin executing Phase 0 tasks (TSK-0.1.2 through TSK-0.3.3)

high_priority_issues.status_note: 2 of 9 tasks already complete (TSK-0.1.1, TSK-0.3.1), 7 remaining

high_priority_issues.title: EURCAD partially populated (50.9%) - inconsistent state
high_priority_issues.status: Known, will resolve with backfill restart
high_priority_issues.impact: One pair has incomplete data (187,179 rows vs expected 368,000)

root_cause.summary: Backfill process hung mid-processing of EURCAD
root_cause.details: Process completed ~6 months of EURCAD before hanging, leaving partial data

resolution.immediate: Backfill restart will complete remaining months
resolution.data_quality: Check for gaps in monthly coverage

high_priority_issues.risk: Low - script should detect existing data and append remaining months

medium_priority_issues.title: Budget allocation not documented at phase level
medium_priority_issues.impact: Difficult to track spending by phase, unclear infrastructure costs

root_cause.summary: Original plan had $650 budget but $422 task costs, $228 unexplained
root_cause.details: Gap analysis revealed budget discrepancy. Updated to $1,050 but breakdown needed.

resolution.immediate: Execute TSK-GAP3.1-3.3 to document budget breakdown

medium_priority_issues.title: No explicit dependency tracking between stages
medium_priority_issues.impact: Harder to track critical path, risk of executing stages out of order

root_cause.summary: Airtable schema lacks 'Prerequisites' field for stages
root_cause.details: Dependencies are implicit (based on phase ordering) rather than explicit

resolution.immediate: Execute TSK-GAP4.1-4.3 to implement dependency tracking

low_priority_issues.title: 11 stages without tasks (26% of stages)
low_priority_issues.impact: Some stages lack detailed breakdown, but most are operational/ongoing

root_cause.summary: Ongoing/operational stages don't require discrete tasks
root_cause.details: Phase 10 operational stages (10.1-10.8) describe processes, not one-time tasks

resolution.recommendation: Add tasks as specific instances arise (e.g., 'Investigate EURUSD drift alert')

low_priority_issues.title: EURUSD has only test run data (8.9% populated)
low_priority_issues.status: Expected, will resolve with backfill restart
low_priority_issues.impact: One pair has minimal data from original test run

root_cause.summary: EURUSD was used for initial backfill testing
root_cause.details: Test run populated some EURUSD data, full backfill will complete it

resolution.immediate: Backfill restart will populate full dataset
resolution.risk: Low - may have duplicate data from test run (script should handle)

resolved_issues.title: Gap analysis revealed missing tasks for Phase 0 and Phase 9
resolved_issues.resolution: Created 26 remediation tasks across 4 work packages, all added to Airtable

resolved_issues.title: Budget discrepancy ($650 plan vs $422 tasks)
resolved_issues.resolution: Updated plan budget to $1,050 (reflects $1,002 task costs + $48 contingency)

resolved_issues.title: BQX files in wrong repository (Robkei-Ring instead of bqx-ml)
resolved_issues.resolution: Migrated 34 BQX files to bqx-ml repository, removed from Robkei-Ring
